title: Wages decrease, restore full employment in LR

content.question: According to the graph above, which of the following statements about the economy is true?

choices.label: The economy is in long-run equilibrium.
The LRAS curve will automatically shift to the right, restoring long-run equilibrium.
In the short run, if wages are sticky the SRAS will shift to the right, lowering prices.
The economy is in a recession, requiring decreases in spending to restore full employment.
Wages will eventually decrease, restoring full employment in the long run.

content.answer: Wages will eventually decrease, restoring full employment in the long run.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
